GSD.product_version: versions from v5.2 to before v5.18.3
GSD.description:
Bluetooth: btmtksdio: fix use-after-free at btmtksdio_recv_event

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.18.3 by commit 01c6a899fa6be4f4cbf60c4f44f0f6691155415f, it was introduced in version v5.2 by commit 9aebfd4a2200ab8075e44379c758bccefdc589bb. For more details please see the references link.
